abstract.para: This document contains installation instructions for the OLAS product.

chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: OLAS is an authentication, signature and user data exchange service. It allows 3th party web application to authenticate users, involve users in transactions and obtain user identity data. It brings to users a central identity management.

section.title: JavaEE Application Server
section.para: OLAS is a JavaEE application that requires a JavaEE application server as runtime environment.

section.title: JBoss Application Server
section.para: OLAS uses JBoss AS 4.2 as application server.

section.title: Database
section.para: OLAS is using the JPA J2EE layer for persistence.
